entries.journal_entry_description: Help Gallura Handerin with whatever tasks she asks of you.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find the missing government courier and, if necessary, recover the papers he was carrying. He was last seen near the Guild Hall. Start looking from there.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Defeat the thugs that jumped you. Maybe they took the papers.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Gallura Handerin in the Coronet capitol building. Tell her you found the courier, but failed to recover the papers.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Your services have been requested by Brantlee Spondoon, aid to the Diktat. Report to her at once.
entries.task06_message_box_text: On one of the thugs, you found some documents sealed with the mark of the Corellian government. These must be the papers the courier was to deliver.
entries.task06_message_box_title: Found on one of the thugs...
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Return to Gallura Handerin in the Coronet capitol building. Tell her you found the courier and were able to recover the papers.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Your services have been requested by Brantlee Spondoon, aid to the Diktat. Report to her at once.
